content.question: A block of mass <math alttext="m" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is at rest on top of a spring of spring constant <math alttext="k" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>k</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> as shown above. The block is then pushed down a distance <math alttext="y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> below its initial position <math alttext="y sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> and released from rest. What is the block’s kinetic energy when it first returns to position <math alttext="y sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="one half k times y squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one half k times y squared plus m g y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one half k times y squared minus m g y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="one half k times y squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
